synonyms.synonym: DNA repair protein complementing XP-F cells

protein.specific_function: Structure-specific DNA repair endonuclease responsible for the 5-prime incision during DNA repair. Involved in homologous recombination that assists in removing interstrand cross-link

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Brookman KW, Lamerdin JE, Thelen MP, Hwang M, Reardon JT, Sancar A, Zhou ZQ, Walter CA, Parris CN, Thompson LH: ERCC4 (XPF) encodes a human nucleotide excision repair protein with eukaryotic recombination homologs. Mol Cell Biol. 1996 Nov;16(11):6553-62.
